resources.string:
Simple paint is a hand drawing application. Chase interview coding challenge. The application works in portrait and landscape. "
" 1. You can start drawing right after the application is up and running. "
" 2. Delete button deletes the current drawing and starts a new one. "
" 3. Once the drawing is completed, it can be saved in camera SD using save icon. "
" 4. You can upload the picture from phone and or take picture and paint. "
" 5. Erase the picture as to enhance the drawing. Unfortunately, color picker is not available as of now but is a TODO feature for future update."
" 6. To get started with drawing, initially users do not have to select the brush, but after eraser has been used. "
"
Happy Drawing!
